text: يصهر به ما فى بطونهم والجلود

translations.translation: which will melt the contents of their bellies as well as their skin,
Which will dissolve everything within their bellies, and their skins.
causing (not only) their skins but all that is in their bellies as well to melt away.
It will melt their skins and all that is in their bellies.
With which will melt what is in their bellies, and their skins.
With it will melt (or vanish away) what is within their bellies, as well as (their) skins.
With it shall be melted what is in their bellies and (their) skins as well.
whereby whatsoever is in their bellies and their skins shall be melted;
Whereby that which is in their bellies, and their skins too, will be melted;
anything in their stomachs as well as their skins will be melted by it.
Molten thereby shall be that which is in their bellies and also their skins.
with which their skins and entrails will fuse,
With it will be scalded what is within their bodies, as well as (their) skins.
With it will melt or vanish away what is within their bellies, as well as (their) skins.
and that which is in their bellies and their skins shall be melted;
Melting their insides and their skins.
By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
[22:20] whereby will be melted that which is in their bellies, of fats and otherwise, and, whereby will be grilled, their skins.
Whereby that which is in their bellies) of fat and other things, (and their skins too, will be melted;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { يُصْهَرُ بِهِ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمْ } معناه تَسيلُ أَمعاؤهم وتَتَناثرُ جِلُودُهم، حتَّى يَقومَ كُلُّ عُضوٍ عَلَى حَيالِهِ، يَدعو بالويلِ والثُّبُورِ
 ويُصهَرُ: معناه يُذابُ

translations.translation:
And His saying, {He will make them taste the severe torment} [means] the flowing of their entrails and the scattering of their skins, until every limb stands on its own, calling for destruction and ruin.


And he is revealed: meaning that he is drawn out

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
بحيث { يُصْهَرُ } ويذاب { بِهِ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمْ } من الشحوم وغيرها { وَ } كذا يذاب به { ٱلْجُلُودُ } [الحج: 20]


{ وَلَهُمْ } أي: لردهم ودفعهم زجراً وقهراً { مَّقَامِعُ } سياط مصنوعة { مِنْ حَدِيدٍ } [الحج: 21] بيد مَن ءوكل عليه من الزبانية { كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوۤاْ أَن يَخْرُجُواْ مِنْهَا } أي: من النار { مِنْ غَمٍّ } وَهَمٍّ وكآبة
 عرض لهم من شدة العذاب
 فطلبوا الخروج تخفيفاً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ يُصهَرُ }: يُذاب { به } أي: بالحميم، { ما في بطونهم } من الأمعاء والأحشاء، { والجلودُ } تذاب أيضًا، فيُؤثر في الظاهر والباطن، كلما نضجت جلودهم بُدلت
 وتقديم ما في الباطن للإيذان بأن تأثيرها في الباطن أقوى من تأثيرها في الظاهر، مع أن ملابستها على العكس
